name: Trash Dump Truck Driver 2020
description:
Drive garbage dump truck in city roads and collect trash. Sweep streets by collecting all line trash with a road cleaner trash truck. Pick up the trashcan from offroad hill areas and then transport the garbage to the city recycling center.

Drive junk disposal truck and activate the cleaner to wipe down the mess. Garbage truck cleaner is a new simulator game to learn how to clean up all rubbish, waste cutting, and trash removal from your city.

Features:
- It's Free with Offline gameplay
- AI traffic system
- Realistic engine sounds
- Heavy trucks simulation
- Cruise and sweep the with best trash services
- Various driving control options (buttons, tilt, steering wheel)
